groups.name: Infoboxes
groups.description: Requirements related to the use of infoboxes in articles.

requirements.description: Include one or more appropriate infoboxes at the top of each article.
requirements.reference: One or more of the following infoboxes as appropriate should be included at the top of each article.

requirements.description: Use Infobox GNF protein for genes/proteins with a human ortholog.
requirements.reference: Use Infobox GNF protein for genes/proteins for which an ortholog is present within the human genome.
requirements.when: Applicable when an ortholog is present within the human genome.

requirements.description: Use Infobox protein for protein family articles discussing more than one protein.
requirements.reference: Use Infobox protein for protein family articles where more than one protein is discussed in the same article.

requirements.description: Use Infobox nonhuman protein for proteins without a human ortholog.
requirements.reference: Use Infobox nonhuman protein for proteins without a human ortholog.
requirements.when: Applicable for proteins without a human ortholog.

requirements.description: Use Infobox protein family for protein families listed in Pfam.
requirements.reference: Use Infobox protein family for protein families that are listed in Pfam.
requirements.when: Applicable for protein families listed in Pfam.

requirements.description: Use Infobox rfam for RNA families listed in Rfam.
requirements.reference: Use Infobox rfam for RNA families that are listed in Rfam.
requirements.when: Applicable for RNA families listed in Rfam.

requirements.description: Use Infobox enzyme for enzymes based on EC number.
requirements.reference: Use Infobox enzyme for enzymes based on EC number.
requirements.when: Applicable for enzymes based on EC number.

requirements.description: Add enzyme infobox if there is only one human paralog assigned to an EC number.
requirements.reference: If there is only one human paralog assigned to a given EC number, then in addition to a protein infobox, it may be appropriate to also add the corresponding enzyme infobox.
requirements.when: Applicable when there is only one human paralog assigned to an EC number.

requirements.description: Add protein family infobox if there is only one human paralog assigned to a Pfam family.
requirements.reference: If there is only one human paralog that has been assigned to Pfam family, then including a protein family infobox may also be appropriate.
requirements.when: Applicable when there is only one human paralog assigned to a Pfam family.

requirements.description: Place less useful infoboxes in a section at the end if many infoboxes apply.
requirements.reference: There exist some cases where a large number of infoboxes may apply to an article. You may put less useful ones in a section at the end, laid side-by-side with a table.
requirements.when: Applicable when many infoboxes apply to an article.

requirements.description: Avoid collapsing or horizontally scrolling infobox tables.
requirements.reference: Collapsing or horizontally scrolling the said table is doubtful, as MOS:COLLAPSE may or may not apply depending on how 'extraneous' the boxes are.
requirements.when: Applicable when considering the presentation of infobox tables.
